701614f-a.title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway North - Lodovick Avenue
701614f-a.text:
Pelham Parkway North (running directly in front of the white house),
at the N.E. corner of Lodovick Ave., showing the William T. Burke real
estate office.
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701614f-a.folder: Pelham Parkway North & Lodovick Avenue, Bronx, NY
